key.summary: Time before session is considered idle
key.description: The number of seconds of inactivity before the session is considered idle (only used at Custom battery plan).

key.summary: Time before session is considered idle
key.description: The number of seconds of inactivity before the session is considered idle (only used at Custom battery plan).

key.summary: Time before session is considered idle
key.description: The number of seconds of inactivity before the session is considered idle (only used at Custom ac plan).

key.name: ac-suspend-delay
key.summary: Time before session is considered idle
key.description: The number of seconds of inactivity before the session is considered idle (only used at Custom ac plan).

key.name: button-power
key.description: The action to take when the system power button is pressed.

key.name: lid-close
key.description: The action to take when the laptop lid is closed.

key.name: lid-close-suspend-with-external-monitor
key.summary: Laptop lid, when closed, will suspend even if there is an external monitor plugged in
key.description: With no external monitors plugged in, closing a laptop's lid will suspend the machine (as set by the lid-close-battery-action and lid-close-ac-action keys). By default, however, closing the lid when an external monitor is present will not suspend the machine, so that one can keep working on that monitor (e.g. for docking stations or media viewers). Set this key to False to keep the default behavior, or to True to suspend the laptop whenever the lid is closed and regardless of external monitors.

key.name: lock-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to lock the screen when the screensaver goes active or computer is suspended.

key.name: percentage-low
key.description: The percentage of the battery when it is considered low. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is false.

key.name: percentage-critical
key.description: The percentage of the battery when it is considered critical. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is false.

key.name: percentage-action
key.description: The percentage of the battery when the critical action is performed. Only valid when use-time-for-policy is false.
